title: Keep Going!
content: Your hard work is noticed. Don't let self-doubt stop you!

title: Stay Strong
content: Tough times don’t last, but tough people do. Keep pushing forward!

title: You Inspire Me
content: I don’t know you personally, but your energy and effort motivate me. Thank you!

title: A Small Reminder
content: Take a break if you need to. You're doing great, but don’t forget to rest.
